actions.name: Icicle Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) cold damage.

actions.name: Spiteful Hail
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) cold damage, and the target’s speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn.

reactions.name: Frosty Aid (1/Day)
reactions.desc: Whenever an allied ice bogie within 30 feet is reduced to 0 hp, this ice bogie can choose to reduce its hp by 3 (1d6), and the ally regains hp equal to the amount of hp this ice bogie lost.

special_abilities.name: Nimble Escape
special_abilities.desc: The bogie can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The bogie has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the bogie’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.
